description.@en: My freewheeling, indulgent ways have garnered me many unique experiences and diverse acquaintances, however brief our time together.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you attempt to determine whether you have heard of someone, a story or other folktale, roll a 1D6 Chaos Die. If the result is face ‘6,’ you immediately recall a factoid about it.
